name: D-Fence
description:
CONTROL:

WASD - Move cursor around play area.

ARROW KEYS - Move cursor around menus.

B - View Build menu.

U - View Upgrade menu.

ENTER/SPACE - Select option in menus.

Move the player cursor around to place weapons and defend your fence from the incoming intruders. When hovering over some weapons, if you have enough scraps, you will be able to upgrade them.

Each intruder will give you scraps when you destroy it.

Good Luck!

Created for the Nokia 3310 Jam 4 - Theme: Upgrade

Made with Godot.

SFX from the Nokia Jam Resources.

Art & Code done by myself.

This is my second game ever finished in as many weeks!
